verbose_text: We found that thapsigargin prevented the cocaine inhibition of GABA B IPSCs in DA neurons (95.63% +/- 1.67% of control, n = 7; p < 0.05 versus cocaine alone, unpaired t test; XREF_FIG), confirming that internal Ca 2+ is necessary for cocaine induced 2-AG mobilization.
evidence: thapsigargin prevented the cocaine inhibition of GABA
